briefTitle: Improving Cancer Screening and Prevention During the COVID-19 Pandemic in Underserved Populations of Rhode Island
officialTitle: Improving Cancer Screening and Prevention During the COVID-19 Pandemic in Underserved Populations of Rhode Island: A Community Based Quality Improvement Project of the Lifespan Cancer Institute
primaryOutcomeMeasure: Increase screening rates for breast and colorectal cancer
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Increased risk of either colorectal or breast cancer
* Living in an under-served area of Rhode Island

Exclusion Criteria:

- None
